title: [K-12] MOOC-based Technical Competency Enhancement Course for Drinking Water System Operators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering and chemistry knowledge, with adaptability to online learning environments
context.additional_context: Inclusive learning design considering socially vulnerable groups, with digital device provision.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic components and operational processes of a drinking water system with 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform water quality testing and pollution management procedures with 90% accuracy using simulation tools.
Learners can independently execute problem-solving procedures based on an emergency response manual with over 70% proficiency.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
